body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia              Now Showing! Find fabulous trail sites through video. Have fun! Please enjoy audio description versions of three videos.             Exhibits - View a series of outdoor exhibits at various sites along El Camino Real de Tierra Adrentro NHT. Take the virtual journey and then visit the site!             Listen to a reading of the El Camino Real de Tierra Adentro National Historic Trail brochure (9.5 MB, mp3, 10 minutes). This is a large file, please be patient while it loads. You can listen to it by clicking on the link, or you can save it to your computer by right-clicking and choosing the "Save Target As" option. For the text of the reading, please see the El Camino Real de Tierra Adentro National Historic Trail brochure, front side (timeline). NPS - April 2011             Photo Gallery - Go here to see and download El Camino Real images
title: El Camino Real de Tierra Adentro National Historic Trail: Photos & Multimedia
